text: Hippopotomonstrosesquipedaliophobia is the fear of long words. It is a word that is mostly ironic in the fact that it is a long word itself but can also cause panic attacks and anxiety. The word for this phobia is one of the longest words in the English Language, behind some other scientific words like chemical or disease names, such as Pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis, a disease caused by breathing silica dust. In which the longest word, pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis, is 45 letters long. While hippopotomonstrosesquippedaliophobia, being 36 letters. It is the 5th longest word in the english language. The possible cause of Hippopotomonstrosesquippedaliophobia, would be related to a traumatic time learning spelling. ==Recognition== The American Psychiatric Association (.APA.) does not officially recognize this phobia. Instead, hippopotomonstrosesquippedaliophobia is considered a social phobia. However, there is not much evidence people actually have it. ==References== Category:Phobias Category:Long words
